schema.title: Bolt Button
schema.description: Buttons are the core of our action components.

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

transform.description: Transforms the button text to various cases.

type.description: Determines the button tag type for semantic buttons

style.description: Style of the button determined by information hierarchy.

width.description: Controls the width of the button.

border_radius.description: Rounds the corners of the button.

align.description: Horizontal alignment of items (text and icon) inside the button. Note: the values left and right are deprecated, use start and end instead.

icon.title: Icon

position.description: Where to position the icon within the button

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

background.description: Customizes the background that's displayed behind the SVG icon itself. Choosing any option other than `none` will automatically add a bit of space around the SVG so the background has the necessary space. Note, this option is now available to icons of all sizes!

color.description: Icon color palette. Picking an option other than `auto` will override the default colors based on the color theme is placed within.

icon.description: Icon data as expected by the icon component. Accepts an additional position prop that determines placement within the link.

iconOnly.description: Make the button to display only the icon and hide the text (which is still required). You are required to pass both text and icon data for this option to work.

url.description: If present, users will be directed to this URL when clicking this element.

target.description: A valid HTML target attribute to modify the behavior when clicking this element.  Only valid when "url" is also present.

disabled.description: Whether the click action should be disabled for this element.

onClick.description: When used with onClickTarget, an event to fire on the targeted elements when this element is clicked.  When used without onClickTarget, arbitrary javascript to execute when this element is clicked.

onClickTarget.description: Requires onClick.  A CSS selector for elements that the onClick event will fire on when this element is clicked.

tag.title: DEPRECATED
tag.description: Switch to using the new type prop instead.

text.description: Renderable text content of the headline.

autoshrink.description: Automatically shrink the font size used in the `xxxlarge` headline size when 60 or more characters are used.

url.description: If provided, turns headline into a link to given url.

icon.description: Bolt icon. Accepts either 1) an icon name as a string 2) an icon object as expected by `@bolt-components-icon` or 3) the string 'none' to explicitly remove default icons

numberText.description: Text that displays in a small circle to the left of the main Headline text. Providing content will trigger the bullet to appear.

numberColor.description: The optional background color of the Headline bullet. Uses inherited theme colors if unspecified.

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

text.description: Renderable content (i.e. a string, render array, or included pattern) for the link.

url.description: If present, users will be directed to this URL when clicking this element.

target.description: A valid HTML target attribute to modify the behavior when clicking this element.  Only valid when "url" is also present.

display.description: Display either an inline link or flex link (icons can hang on either side).

valign.description: Controls the vertical alignment of text and icon.

isHeadline.description: Whether this link should get special headline styling treatment.

icon.title: Icon

position.description: Where to position the icon within the button

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

background.description: Customizes the background that's displayed behind the SVG icon itself. Choosing any option other than `none` will automatically add a bit of space around the SVG so the background has the necessary space. Note, this option is now available to icons of all sizes!

color.description: Icon color palette. Picking an option other than `auto` will override the default colors based on the color theme is placed within.

icon.description: Icon data as expected by the icon component. Accepts an additional position prop that determines placement within the link.

onClick.description: When used with onClickTarget, an event to fire on the targeted elements when this element is clicked.  When used without onClickTarget, arbitrary javascript to execute when this element is clicked.

onClickTarget.description: Requires onClick.  A CSS selector for elements that the onClick event will fire on when this element is clicked.

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

background.description: Customizes the background that's displayed behind the SVG icon itself. Choosing any option other than `none` will automatically add a bit of space around the SVG so the background has the necessary space. Note, this option is now available to icons of all sizes!

color.description: Icon color palette. Picking an option other than `auto` will override the default colors based on the color theme is placed within.

theme.description: Color theme. Can be set to 'none' for a transparent background.

title.description: Navbar title. Icon is optional. Tag can be set to h1 to h6 depending on the page.

name.description: Name of the (optional) icon to be used.

center.description: Determines if you want the Navbar content to be center aligned or not

width.description: Adjusts the Navbar's overall maximum width behavior -- either filling up the entire browser's total screen width (full) or just the component's parent container width (auto).

moreText.description: (Inherited from nav-priority) Button text that displays when the Priority+ Nav Dropdown is displayed.

offset.description: (Inherited from nav-indicator) Number of pixels taken up by sticky items at the top of the page.  Used for smooth scroll and gumshoe.

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

media.description: Pass in any renderable media content via the `media.content` prop.

content.description: Figure media content, e.g image, icon, video, etc.

content.title: DEPRECATED.
content.description: Figure contains no content. Only media and caption.

schema.title: Bolt Ratio
schema.description: A small helper-component that display's nested content / other components at a specific aspect ratio.

attributes.title: Attributes (Twig-only)
attributes.description: A Drupal attributes object. Used to apply with extra HTML attributes to the outer <bolt-ratio> tag.

children.title: Children (Twig-only)
children.description: Nested content to nest inside the <bolt-ratio> component when used in a Twig template.

ratio.title: Ratio (Twig & Web Component)
ratio.description: Set the aspect ratio for the ratio object via slash-separated width and height values, e.g. 4/3, 16/9, 1/1, etc.

aspectRatioWidth.title: Deprecated
aspectRatioWidth.description: Twig-specific prop for setting the width portion of the component's aspect ratio. Will be removed in Bolt v3.0. Use the simpler ratio prop instead.

aspect-ratio-width.title: Deprecated
aspect-ratio-width.description: Web component-specific prop for setting the width portion of the bolt-ratio web component's aspect ratio. Will be removed in Bolt v3.0. Use the simpler ratio prop instead.

aspectRatioHeight.title: Deprecated
aspectRatioHeight.description: Twig-specific prop for setting the height portion of the component's aspect ratio. Will be removed in Bolt v3.0. Use the simpler ratio prop instead.

aspect-ratio-height.title: Deprecated
aspect-ratio-height.description: Web component-specific prop for setting the height portion of the bolt-ratio web component's aspect ratio. Will be removed in Bolt v3.0. Use the simpler ratio prop instead.

no_css_vars.title: Disable CSS Custom Prop Rendering (Twig-only)
no_css_vars.description: Manually disables CSS Variable-based rendering for <bolt-ratio> in Twig templates. Useful for testing cross browser functionality. By default this is automatically enabled / disabled based on browser support for CSS Vars.

no-css-vars.title: No CSS Vars (Web Component-only)
no-css-vars.description: Manually disables CSS Variable-based rendering on the <bolt-ratio> custom element. Useful for testing cross browser functionality. By default this is automatically enabled / disabled based on browser support for CSS Vars.

no_shadow.title: Disable Shadow DOM (Twig-only)
no_shadow.description: Manually disables the component from rendering to the Shadow DOM in a Twig template. Useful for testing cross browser functionality / rendering behavior. By default this is enabled / disabled based on browser support.

no-shadow.title: Disable Shadow DOM (Web Component-only)
no-shadow.description: Manually disables the web component from rendering to the Shadow DOM. Useful for testing cross browser functionality / rendering behavior. By default this is enabled / disabled based on browser support.

boltActionElement.title: Bolt Action Element
boltActionElement.description: A starting point for components that have an "action" (e.g. button, link, etc.)

url.description: If present, users will be directed to this URL when clicking this element.

target.description: A valid HTML target attribute to modify the behavior when clicking this element.  Only valid when "url" is also present.

disabled.description: Whether the click action should be disabled for this element.

onClick.description: When used with onClickTarget, an event to fire on the targeted elements when this element is clicked.  When used without onClickTarget, arbitrary javascript to execute when this element is clicked.

onClickTarget.description: Requires onClick.  A CSS selector for elements that the onClick event will fire on when this element is clicked.

offset.description: Number of pixels taken up by sticky items at the top of the page.  Used for smooth scroll and gumshoe.

moreText.description: Button text that displays when the Priority+ Nav Dropdown is displayed

offset.description: (Inherited from nav-indicator) Number of pixels taken up by sticky items at the top of the page.  Used for smooth scroll and gumshoe.

schema.title: Navlink
schema.description: Navlinks are stylized links used within the Navbar

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

active.description: Automatically mark a Navlink as active

text.description: Renderable text content for the link.

url.description: A url to link to.  This may also be passed as part of `attributes`

icon.description: Icon data as expected by the icon component.  Accepts an additional 'position' parameter that determines placement within the Navlink.
